title: Boxed bedrooms. Pretty bright quiet unit. Serene tree lined block
posting_body: ['Rent stabilized.', 'Pretty fully boxed 2-bedroom apartment in an intimate clean and well maintained small tudor style building on a serene tree lined block in Upper Glendale.', 'Overlooks a yard .', 'Great light in every room.', 'Entry hallway.', 'Beautiful hardwood floors throughout.', 'Good closet space.', 'Tv/stereo system nook in a living room.', 'Square rooms.', 'Large eat-in windowed kitchen with ample cabinet space.', 'Beautiful and just freshly tiled and renovated bathroom is windowed and has designer finishes and a bath tub.', 'Building is nice and clean, very well maintained, super quiet, and occupied by respectful long term neighbors.', 'Prime block and location in Upper Glendale, 70s near MyrtleAve.', 'Laundromat around the corner.', 'Buses right on Myrtle avenue take you in numerous directions to numerous trains.', 'Close to all shopping , restaurants, parks , and all other neighborhood conveniences.', 'Atlas Mall, Trader Joes, Home Depot and more near by.', 'Easy parking, no alternate side regulations.', 'Sorry no pets.', 'Video available upon request.', 'If you are interested in this apartment or any of my other strictly exclusive Astoria, Ridgewood, Bushwick, Glendale, and Middle Village listings, please register your inquiry by replying to this post.', 'Please feel free to provide any information you consider pertinent to your search.', 'Ridgewood Based Independent Broker.', 'Representing strictly hands on local owners of small buildings and houses.', 'No large buildings or impersonal managements.', 'Andrea Bohackova', 'Licensed Real Estate Broker', 'Sales Rentals Property Management', 'Manhattan Queens Brooklyn', '917-291-2149', '<URL>', '<URL>', 'Andrea Bohackova Licensed Real Estate Broker does Business in Accordance With the Federal Fair Housing Law.', 'All information furnished herein is from sources deemed reliable.', 'No representation is made by Andrea Bohackova Licensed Real Estate Broker nor is any to be implied as to the accuracy thereof and all information is submitted subject to errors, omissions, change of price, prior sale or lease, or withdrawal without notice.', 'All dimensions are approximate.', 'For exact dimensions, please hire your own architect or engineer.', 'Regarding Leasing Only: Applicants Must Demonstrate their ability to pay rent either through employment or other means.']
